name: BackRoomsNew
description:
This game is BackRoomsNew in game after each level the game will be more difficult and in each level there will be all kinds of monsters that will try to catch you.
All levels are mazes from which you have to escape and when you escape it will be another maze again.
Each level will have a task where you have to find a key or lever and various items to open the door, but some levels only require finding the exit, such as level 0.
